name: THE CORPS (pre-alpha 0.0.1) hotline miami fan made
name_original: THE CORPS (pre-alpha 0.0.1) hotline miami fan made
description:
te gusto hotline miami?,este juego te encantara con una musica rock extremadamente epica y una jugabilidad extremadamente dificil(o no como tu prefieras).

Con 3 personajes a elegir y con 3 skins cada uno un juego que disfrutaras mucho

Did you like Hotline Miami ?This game will enchant you with extremely epic rock music and extremely difficult gameplay (or not as you prefer).

With 3 characters to choose from and with 3 skins each a game that you will enjoy a lot
